snippet: Delivery of the Su-25 aircraft is the latest step Iran has taken to help Prime Minister Nuri Kamal al-Maliki battle the forces of the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria.
abstract: Iran sends three Russian-made attack planes to Iraqi government, latest step country has taken to help Prime Min Nuri Kamal al-Maliki battle forces of the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria, or ISIS, and expand its influence as Iraqi politicians struggle to form a new government.

byline.original: By MICHAEL R. GORDON and ERIC SCHMITT

lead_paragraph: Delivery of the Su-25 aircraft is the latest step Iran has taken to help Prime Minister Nuri Kamal al-Maliki battle the forces of the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria.

headline.main: Iran Sends 3 Attack Planes to Iraqi Government
headline.print_headline: Iran Sends 3 Attack Planes to Iraqi Government

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
